name: dreno
description: A framework that takes the best out of Cycle, React and Mobx.

scripts.build: browserify src/index.js -o lib/dreno.js -s dreno -u react -u react-dom -u xstream -u create-ueact-class -u es6-set
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && cat package.json | jq '.main = "lib/dreno.js"' > tmp.json && mv tmp.json package.json
scripts.postpublish: cat package.json | jq '.main = "src/index.js"' > tmp.json && mv tmp.json package.json

author: Giovanni T. Parra
